Properties.Title: Consider additional enhancements to your App

Properties.Content:
Looking to mitigate data entry twice. Streamline your operations from Bid Management into Project Management by bringing over relevant information captured during the Bid Phase. 

Manage the entire lifecycle of a bid and provide granular visibility to all stakeholders with our CRM & Bid Management Applications

Properties.LabelOverride: Imagine key pieces of information from your BId Management App prepopulate or be referenced here

Properties.Title: Consider additional enhancements to your App

Properties.Content: Don't let any of your RFIs slip through the cracks. Track and manage Requests for Information throughout all of your projects with the RFI Tracker. Imagine managing and bringing visibility to all of your RFIs, Days Pending and reminders all on one dashboard across all job.

Properties.Title: Consider additional enhancements to your App

Properties.LabelOverride: Imagine a Table of Records of your Employee Time Cards here.

Properties.Content:
Enhance your Project Hub application by installing and integrating the Time Tracking ProApp for your employees to enter time to each Cost Code. 

Obtain visibility to actual hours worked in real time and compare against your budget line items breakdown. Bring visibility to your entire teams with the progress or overage of each line item.

Properties.Title: Consider additional enhancements to your App

Properties.Content:
Does your field teams have clear visibility to all of your assemblies for each Project in real time? 

Improve communication and visibility for all departments involved in your prefab operations to ensure your assemblies arrive on time per your schedule requirements.

Properties.LabelOverride: Imagine a table of records that shows all of the Prefab Units associated with this Project

Properties.Content: Engage with your AE or CSM to discuss creating and connecting other applications to track all of your other resources such as Fleet, Equipment, Tools, and more! Our team of specialists are ready to support your development needs!

Properties.Title: Consider additional enhancements to your App

Properties.Content:
Incidents happen. Don't forget to track 'em!

Easily log incidents and track compliance back to each Project for real time visibility. Leverage permissions to protect sensitive information all while generating data for your OSHA Reports, TRIR and EMR ratings.

Project Companies
Properties.Description: This table is to assign companies to a project to keep track of your company rosters per Project

Properties.Label: Add Project Contact
Properties.Formula:
URLRoot() & "db/" & [_DBID_PROJECT_CONTACTS] &
"?a=API_GenAddRecordForm" &
"&formid=10" &
"&_fid_15=" & URLEncode([Record ID#]) &
"&_fid_7=" & URLEncode([Related Company]) &
"&_fid_8=" & URLEncode([Related Project]) &
"&z=" & Rurl()

Report.BadRef: Referenced cross-app report not found in solution

Properties.Name: Project Team
Properties.Description: This table is meant to be your internal employee roster for each Project. This will allow you to add internal employees so you know who is assigned to this job

Properties.Label: Days Open
Properties.Formula:
If(
[Status]="Cancelled", [Date Cancelled]-[Date RFI Created],
[Status]="Answered", ([Date Answered]-[Date RFI Created]),(Today()-[Date RFI Created]))

ColorCoding.ColorFormula: Case([Status],"Draft","#7FE2EA", "Internal Review","#fce069", "Creating RFI Package","#fce069", "Pending GC Response","#fce069", "Received From GC","#d0e680", "Answered","#96e2ab", "Cancelled","#f8a897")

Properties.Label: Generate Document
Properties.Formula:
var number recordId = [Record ID#];  //record ID# you want you are generating the document from
var number templateId = 7;  //ID of the template you'd like to generate
var text tableId = Dbid(); //tableID of the table the template was built in
var text fileName = "myqbdoc"; //name of the generated file
var text format = "pdf"; //output formats: html, pdf, docx
var text qbRealm = NotRight(NotLeft(URLRoot(), 8), "/") ; //gets the current realm, required for API requests


"https://api.quickbase.com/v1/docTemplates/" & $templateId &"/generate?&tableId=" & $tableId & "&realm=" & $qbRealm  & "&filename=" & $fileName & "&format=" & $format &"&recordId=" & ToText($recordId)

Properties.Label: Log Photos
Properties.Formula:
var Text realmHostName = NotRight(NotLeft(URLRoot(), 8), "/");
"https://api.plugins.quickbase.com/launch?pluginId=qb-uploader&pid=" & [Record ID#] & "&configId=2yIQqy5o3Y7EFwUTy1CyXgUaGwC&appId="&AppID()&"&realmHostname=" & URLEncode($realmHostName)

Properties.Name: Schedule Items
Properties.Description: This table is for all project schedule tasks. This table helps to identify your 3 week look ahead tasks and overall schedule  plan

Properties.Label: Task:Past due
Properties.Formula: If([Status] <> "Complete" and [Actual End Date] < Today(), true, false)

Properties.Label: Invoice Days Outstanding
Properties.Formula:
If([Status]="Submitted",Today()-[Date Invoice Sent],
If([Status]="Paid",[Date Paid]-[Date Invoice Sent],null))

Properties.Name: Files
Properties.Description: This table can house files per project. We do not recommend housing 3D Models, large drawing sets. But you can include various files to help keep track per project. You can also link to your Shared Drive for quick reference to larger files.

Properties.Content: Add file above or add link to file below.

Properties.Label: Photo Preview
Properties.Formula:
If( Lower(Right([Photo], 4)) = ".jpg" or Lower(Right([Photo], 5)) = ".jpeg" or Lower(Right([Photo], 4)) = ".png" or Lower(Right([Photo], 4)) = ".gif", "
" & "" & "" & "
", "" )

Properties.Name: PTPs
Properties.Description: This table is for your Pre-Task Plans

Properties.DefaultValue: Please identify how you plan to prepare or control the hazards identied
Properties.Label: Preparation Plan

Properties.DefaultValue: Please list all activities in sequence
Properties.Label: Activities
Mark Yes or No if it applies
1. Does every crew member know how to use assigned tools and equipment?
2. Does this work require special training?
3. Is there adequate lighting and access?
4. Are SDS sheets required and available?
5. Are occupied spaces adjacent to or below this task?
6. Are any special permits or procedures required?
7. Does this task require shutdown of existing systems or equipment?
Check if any of the following apply

Properties.Content: Consider the work to be performed and mark “Yes” or “No” if it applies to the task at hand.

Properties.LabelOverride: 1. Does every crew member know how to use assigned tools and equipment?
2. Does this work require special training?
3. Is there adequate lighting and access?
4. Are SDS sheets required and available?
5. Are occupied spaces adjacent to or below this task?
6. Are any special permits or procedures required?
7. Does this task require shutdown of existing systems or equipment?

Properties.Content: Check if any of the following apply ( attach additional information or permits if required).

Properties.Label: Did we meet the project Objectives
Was the project completed on time
Was the Quality of work upto standard
Was there Prefab on this Project?
Were there any risks that were not anticipated
What could have been done better?
What went well during the Project

Properties.Content:
Application Dashboards

 

Click each button to review the user type's related dashboard. After reviewing and setting up the application, you can assign users to each role and delete this page if you wish.
